titleStmt.title: Directions for prayer, for the Diocess of Bath and Wells. To the poor inhabitants within the Diocess of Bath and Wells, Thomas their unworthy bishop wisheth the knowledge and the love of God.
titleStmt.author: Ken, Thomas, 1637-1711.

notesStmt.note: Known to be issued in at least two settings of type. This printing has "Price 2d." below caption title, and has catchword "this" on p. 1.
Reproduction of original in: Trinty College (Dublin, Ireland) Library.
